display: lets make sure we add a quick note about using supabase CLI to generate our types from DB migrations. We also probably need a quick note about DB migrations on supabase as well
adding a new Account throws the following error - Failed to create account: insert or update on table "accounts" violates foreign key constraint "accounts_user_id_fkey"

lets take a look at our Accounts.  1 - On the Accounts page there is no way to edit the Account Details such as Institution.

I also think it would helpful to track balances against dates since that fluxuates.  When I click the existing edit button and it switches to the input box lets saves that new balance with a default time as "now".

Lets also add an Institutions Table so we tie together Accounts across the system.  Lets seed this table with the Big Banks and Investment Firms

lets begin working on the the @apps/web/ project - This website will be used for using Ai to assist in project management.  We have a supabase DB running on the CLI (you can add supabase information with `supabase status` We will to connect to to both Confluence for knowledge management and Mondays for Task Management. Our goal will be to aggregate context with Confluence pages to write user stories that will be saved in confluence. Once we have a completed story in Confluence we  will be need to create Tasks on Monday.  We want to utilize @docs/SPEC_DRIVEN_DEVELOPMENT.md - lets start with reviewing our @docs/ and work on a plan for how this application for work.  Feature I want to support are loading context for story writting. Writting Stories, writting business requirements, breaking down a story into tasks, organizing stories under features and epics.  sync stories, tasks and features between confluence and mondays.  I also want to design database tables and other domain model data.

Type: Task  
Priority: Medium  
Assignee: Piyush Handa

This evaluation examined the architectural requirements for the client-side backend application. BR-TREAS-041: ACH Return Processing Requirements (ID: 1124106241)

Core rule about returns being NEW transactions, not reversals


BR-TREAS-042: ACH Return Alternative Payment Generation (ID: 1122533424)

Automatic check reissue within 1 business day


BR-TREAS-043: ACH Return Account Balance Requirements (ID: 1123909647)

Balance validation between employer and employee return accounts


BR-TREAS-044: ACH Return Fund Segregation (ID: 1122500680)

Critical rule that returns never go back to pooled funding


BR-TREAS-045: ACH Return Notification Requirements (ID: 1123090475)

15-minute notification SLA with escalation triggers


BR-TREAS-046: ACH Return Reconciliation Timing (ID: 1124139009)

Return accounts remain until alternative payments clear


BR-TREAS-047: NACHA Return Code Processing Actions (ID: 1123680286)

Comprehensive table with all 35 NACHA codes and specific actions
